ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.util
Class HaltingThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.util.HaltingThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class HaltingThread
extends java.lang.Thread

This is a subclass of java.lang.Thread that includes a non-intrusive 'halt' method. The Halt method simply sets a boolean that can be checked periodically during expensive processing.

Version:
$Id: HaltingThread.java 478169 2006-11-22 14:23:24Z dvholten $
Author:
deweese

static void haltThread()
